mapper.update: update MENU_DETAIL set MENU_INDEX = #{menuIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MENU_DETAIL_NAME = #{menuDetailName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_DETAIL_ORDER = #{menuDetailOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MENU_DETAIL_DESC = #{menuDetailDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_FUNCTIONG_PAGE = #{menuFunctiongPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MENU_DETAIL_INDEX = #{menuDetailIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select MENU_DETAIL_INDEX, MENU_INDEX, MENU_DETAIL_NAME, MENU_DETAIL_ORDER, MENU_DETAIL_DESC, MENU_FUNCTIONG_PAGE from MENU_DETAIL where MENU_DETAIL_INDEX = #{menuDetailIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select MENU_DETAIL_INDEX, MENU_INDEX, MENU_DETAIL_NAME, MENU_DETAIL_ORDER, MENU_DETAIL_DESC, MENU_FUNCTIONG_PAGE from MENU_DETAIL
select MENU_DETAIL_INDEX, MENU_INDEX, MENU_DETAIL_NAME, MENU_DETAIL_ORDER, MENU_DETAIL_DESC, MENU_FUNCTIONG_PAGE from MENU_DETAIL where MENU_INDEX = #{menuIndex} order by MENU_DETAIL_ORDER asc
